TITLE Jungle Tofu

# Press [12 oz extra-firm tofu].
# Cut tofu into half inch cubes.
# In a large pan, saute tofu until lightly browned, stirring occasionally. Remove from pan; keep warm.
# julienne [1 item red bell pepper], trim [2 cup haricots verts], and cube [4 cup eggplant].
# Saute haricots verts, eggplant, and bell pepper. 
# Add [2 tbl green curry paste]; cook 30 seconds, stirring frequently. 
# Add reserved tofu and warm through. 
# Serve with [lime wedges] if desired.
